channel.title: New skill destroys RuneScape
channel.description: Well in my opinion this new skill sucks but the strongest weapon in the game is no longer the godsword, there Chaotic maul has a strength bonus of +155, screw rs.

item.title: New skill destroys RuneScape
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:47, topic:336631”][quote author=Javafire link=topic=433000.msg3183763#msg3183763 date=1271545178]

Well in my opinion this new skill sucks but the strongest weapon in the game is no longer the godsword, there Chaotic maul has a strength bonus of +155, screw rs.

It’s their fucking game, let them add what they want. If you don’t like it, then don’t play. Simple as that.

Your an idiot, all i did was just post my opinion about there new release, and simple said it sucks.
[/quote] yeah but THEY will never hear you from complaining about this on moparscape. everyone already knows it sucks

They hear it on their own forums. Lol.[/quote]
I like to bold letters too.
It gets boring quickly, and for those who do play it, lemme explain some shit. If you are in a party, use fucking teamwork. I hate being on a team with a bunch of arrogant, greedy 10 year olds… don’t do the following:
1.Steal all the money. Then later, leave your team and go make a shit load of armor and not share.
2.Steal all the food. Idgaf if you’re lower level. I waste my hp killing the monster, and you just take the food.
3.Multiple key people. Omg, so annoying. Just let ONE person be the key person, tired of all this key shit going on.
4.Finish the dungeon. I hate when people go straight for the boss. I actually care about exp, don’t you?
5.Running off alone. Not cool, cuz I can never get find the person and have to walk 15 fucking rooms 2 find em.
6.Dieing. Ok, you died once, now don’t continuously die.
7.Table hog. Relates to the first 2 things, but seriously don’t be a table hog.
8.Bind your item, so that way you don’t fucking freak out if you don’t have the weapon in the next floor.
9.Work together to solve puzzles. Don’t just leave the dungeon b’c you can’t get one room
10.Be a team. It’s why your in the “team” area. Talk with each other, pick a key person, who should hold stuff like tinderboxes, hammers, rods, ect. Find who is best at combat, let them maybe have a bit more food and do a bit more fighting. Don’t rush into a room without your teammates. Same thing with bosses, see what boss it is, do we have the necessary combat style, ect. The skill is a big update, and while I don’t like it, some people do. So if you’re a fag who plays this and does teamwork, try to follow these guidelines.

Read full topic

I love the new skill. I think that its a great idea and a great way to get fellow RuneScapers to work together. Because you cannot solo a dungeon, it forces players to talk to one another. Thus making RuneScape a very friendly community once again.
[/quote]I got mad and kicked my team for taking my drop, not very friendly if you ask me.[/quote]
did they tell you what your drop is…?

I hate fucking skill… im never playin rs again…
